column5: Electronic and Electrical Engineering with Industry Course OverviewOurÂ MSc Electronic and Electrical Engineering with Industry course is only open to International students.There is a selection process for this course - see the 'how to apply' section on this page.Gain two years' experience in the UK and the opportunity to work in collaboration with industry on a real-life challenge.This new MSc is an extension of ourMSc Electronic and Electrical Engineeringand includes a second year allowing you to undertake either anindustry placementor anindustry-focused projectwith an industrial partner.
